name: Space Way
description:
Dominate the space route and make the best score! Space Way is a fast and fun game where the set is synchronized with music! Collect as many balls as the more you collect, the higher your score will be! Your speed also increases progressively, so the more your speed increases, the more complicated the game becomes! However, you may slow down by collecting bullets on your way and maybe even get a great slow motion!
It is an arcade type game that allows you to relax when you watch a video or to entertain yourself during the loading of another game for example.

Features:

■ Unique design!
■ Infinite and completely random!
■ Decor moves according to music!
■ Addictive Gameplay!
